name: Skate Board Jumper
description:
Skate Board Jumper is a new free skate games with a lot of challenge, players and levels to Unlock! If you are looking for skateboard games, so this the right choice for you. As this Skateboard Jumper is different from any other Skateboard game and rated as one of the the best time killer games application. Speed Up, Jumpand Turn as Fast as posible!
How to play:
It's easy and fun to play! All you have to do is just to touch the screen and off you go. It is your touch that will let the skater boy jump with his patin. If you are among newbies out there, do practice jumping before you start succeeding in going up one level at a time. To win all this stages you only need fast in decision making and accuracy.

Features:
- Simple and intuitive control
- Attractive graphics
- Colorful animation
- Fun and addictive
gameplay
- Amazing fantasy skateboard
game sounds
Do you think you are up
for the challenge? Download and get on your board now to skate your way to the
top and earn score as high as possible! Compete against other players from
around the world by your own strategy.
Play with your friends, complete achievements, gain experience and upgrade your favorite skater. You can also customize your outfits, boards, trucks and wheels with real Skateboard Jumper.
Download this game for free now and start enjoy.
